content: left of the first one and rejoin yarn into this same space continue moving from right to left skip 4 motifs and mark the fifth one skip 5 more motifs and mark the sixth one skip 4 more motifs and mark the fifth one begin edging working along top edge of bag * chain 4 slip_stitch into next chain 4 space repeat from * ending with a slip_stitch into first stitch of the round next round chain 1 single_crochet into each slip_stitch and each chain from previous round end with a slip_stitch into first st next round - begin handles chain 90 skip all stitches before next marker single_crochet in each stitch to next marker begin second handle chain 90 skip all stitches before next marker single_crochet in each stitch to end of round next round single_crochet in every single_crochet and in every chain to end of round if you would like wider handles work 1 or more spiral rounds of single_crochet end with a slip_stitch into first st fasten_off yarn copyright 2022 lisa hounshell
